item.title: One Person Missing After Oil Tanker and Container Ship Collide in the North Sea
item.description: A container ship hit a stationary U.S.-flagged oil tanker on Monday, forcing the crews to abandon ship. A search for a missing crew member ended Monda...

item.title: Ukraine and U.S. Talks on War Begin as Gulfs Remain
item.description: American and Ukrainian representatives are meeting in Saudi Arabia, but the United States, Ukraine and Russia envisage very different paths to peace.

item.title: Hundreds of Civilians in Syria Take Shelter at Russian Air Base
item.description: Footage and satellite images reviewed by The Times show civilians in the compound. Thousands have fled violent unrest in the country’s coastal region.

item.title: Philippines’ Ex-President Duterte Arrested Under I.C.C. Warrant
